name: Trash Smash
description:
Trash Smash is a satirical two player game where you try to beat the other opponent with good intentions to recycle only to end up attacking each other as the trash problem suddenly grows out of hand! Who will end up losing the least?

Made for 48hr KiwiJam18 with the theme of Single Use.

Design, art and programming by Ben Coombs.

Made with Unity.
